content.raw:
Thanks for the PR. We need to keep in mind we should update the tutorial to take this into account (but the tutorial needs a lot of changes for default anyway).

I imagine the problems mentioned on issue #122 were not using the default branch, but I'm not sure if it would be a good idea to change the behaviour on a "released" version. Thoughts, @iche033 ?
content.html:
Thanks for the PR. We need to keep in mind we should update the tutorial to take this into account (but the tutorial needs a lot of changes for default anyway).
